objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#F5F5F5'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='540' height='540' fill='#2C3E50'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='540' fill='#34495E'/><rect x='0' y='540' width='540' height='540' fill='#34495E'/><rect x='540' y='540' width='540' height='540' fill='#F1C40F'/><g opacity='0.2'><path d='M50 50 L250 50 L250 70 L50 70 Z' fill='#FFFFFF'/><path d='M50 100 L230 100 L230 120 L50 120 Z' fill='#FFFFFF'/><path d='M50 150 L200 150 L200 170 L50 170 Z' fill='#FFFFFF'/><path d='M50 200 L180 200 L180 220 L50 220 Z' fill='#FFFFFF'/><path d='M50 250 L240 250 L240 270 L50 270 Z' fill='#FFFFFF'/></g><g opacity='0.2'><circle cx='270' cy='270' r='100' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='810' cy='810' r='100' fill='#2C3E50'/></g><g opacity='0.1'><line x1='600' y1='600' x2='1000' y2='1000' stroke='#2C3E50' stroke-width='5'/><line x1='650' y1='600' x2='1050' y2='1000' stroke='#2C3E50' stroke-width='5'/><line x1='700' y1='600' x2='1100' y2='1000' stroke='#2C3E50' stroke-width='5'/></g><g opacity='0.2'><rect x='100' y='650' width='20' height='100' fill='#FFFFFF'/><rect x='130' y='630' width='20' height='120' fill='#FFFFFF'/><rect x='160' y='670' width='20' height='80' fill='#FFFFFF'/><rect x='190' y='640' width='20' height='110' fill='#FFFFFF'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
• Crystal clear E-ink display
• Weeks of battery life
• Storage for thousands of books
• Anti-glare for outdoor reading

product_details.name: Ultra-Slim E-Reader: Your Entire Library in One Sleek Device
product_details.description:
• Crystal clear 6-inch E-ink display for comfortable reading day and night
• Lightweight and portable design - perfect for one-handed reading
• Weeks of battery life on a single charge
• Storage capacity for thousands of books
• Anti-glare screen technology for outdoor reading
• Adjustable front light for reading in any environment
• Multiple font sizes and styles for personalized reading experience
• Wi-Fi connectivity for instant book downloads
• Slim bezels for maximized reading area
• User-friendly interface for seamless navigation

banner_details:
The banner is designed with a clean, quadrant-style layout divided into four equal sections. The top-left section contains a bold and dynamic heading (`heading`) in white over a dark blue background, with a modern sans-serif font. Beneath it sits a bright yellow tagline (`tagline`) that adds contrast and visual hierarchy. The top-right quadrant showcases a reading device image (`product_image`) over a muted blue background, creating a focal point.

In the bottom-left section, bullet points (`description`) detail key features in white font, maintaining readability over a dark background. The bottom-right quadrant emphasizes the promotional offer with a large, dark blue price (`price`) and a prominent call-to-action button (`cta`) with bold text on a yellow background to draw attention.

Color palette:
- Deep Blue (#2C3E50)
- Midnight Blue (#34495E)
- Bright Yellow (#F1C40F)
- White (#FFFFFF)

The banner balances readability, hierarchy, and promotional emphasis, making it ideal for digital product advertising.
product_color: The product image uses a soft, minimalistic color palette to evoke calmness and focus. Dominant colors include matte black from the tablet device (#1E1E1E), light skin tones (#D9A17A), muted whites from the background (#F8F8F8), and a soft grayish tone from the bedding (#DADADA). These colors blend smoothly, with the clean white background enhancing the sleekness of the black tablet, making it the focal point. The subdued tones highlight the warmth of the skin tone, drawing attention subtly to the hands interacting with the device. This palette is ideal for a modern, tech-centric banner design focused on sophistication and comfort.
